http.error403: Sorry, but you are not allowed to do this. Try refreshing browser or contact administrator.
http.error404: This page or entity was not found. Try refreshing browser.
http.error500: Sorry, server encountered an internal error. Please refresh your browser and try again. Error was reported to us and we are trying to fix it.
http.error600: Sorry, something went wrong. Try refreshing your browser.
http.error601: Your login expired. Please refresh your browser or login again.
http.error602: Your IP address has changed since last visit. Please refresh your browser.

roles.userNotFound: User with this email not found. Tell him to register first.
roles.userLinkedUp: User was successfully added to this role
roles.userUnlinked: User was successfully removed from this role
roles.unlink: Are you sure you want to remove this user from this role?
